metadata.synopsis: If players will try to steal anything, Archivist will warn about them
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. teleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_CheckTrappedTreasuresTrigger3. Try to steal anything while Archivist is looking

0.speaker: Archivist
0.text: Lay a finger on the master's treasures, and you will lose the entire hand.
0.context: NodeContext: Calm, matter of fact warning
